ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 30 Nov 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Heh heh, I have a question do caster's get interrupted every time they are
> bashed for 1 pt even when they are not stunned? I know I lose my song
> whenever bashed for damage. I nearly died fighting three green no xp

From what I've seen, yes, being bashed will always result in a
spell interruption. Being hit usually results in spell
interruption too, so they have it worse than we do.

At higher levels, about once a RL week, I'll be bashed, take
damage, and my song will not end. It's rare enough that it's
probably a bug. :-)
